solution_line_template: August solved a math problem that had an answer twice as big as the answer of the first math problem, meaning the next answer was {first_problem_answer}*{multiplier_twice} = <<{first_problem_answer}*{multiplier_twice}={second_problem_answer}>>{second_problem_answer}
